name: Juanita G. Tabouris
summary: A detail-oriented professional with strong leadership, organizational, and communication skills developed through diverse experiences in academic and professional settings. My background in managing and coaching teams, facilitating meetings, and handling complex processes has equipped me with the ability to mentor, guide, and inspire learners. I honed my ability to manage group dynamics, delegate tasks, and foster collaboration. My professional experience includes coaching teammates as a Subject Matter Expert and providing client support, where I developed my ability to explain complex topics in clear, engaging ways. I am also fluent in Filipino and English, enabling me to connect effectively with diverse audiences.
skills: Fixing Technical Issues of the Customers

experience.position: Subject Matter Expert | Clinical Review Team
description: Assisting teammates with work process concerns
Coaching teammates and facilitating team meetings
In charge with suggesting process improvements to clients
Scheduling their Providers and our Clinicians
Checking if Providers are In-Network with the Health Plan

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Management Accounting
